name: Arobinda Gupta
content: Arobinda Gupta Arobinda Gupta Ph.D., University of Iowa, 1997 Professor and Head, Department of Computer Science & Engineering Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur 721302, India Email: agupta [AT] cse.iitkgp.ac.in Research Interests Networks, Distributed Systems, Electric Vehicle Charge Scheduling Publications Current Courses (Spring 2025) CS60002: Distributed Systems CS29206: Systems Programming Lab PhD Students Umesh Deshpande (VNIT Nagpur) Himadri Sekhar Paul (TCS Innovation Lab, Kolkata) Sushanta Karmakar (IIT Guwahati) Rajib Ranjan Maiti (BITS Pilani Hyderabad Campus) Dinesh Dash (NIT Patna) Joy Chandra Mukherjee (IIT Bhubaneswar) Subhrangshu Mandal (IIT (ISM), Dhanbad ) John C. John (Govt. Engineering College, Kerala) Soumadip Biswas (IEM, Kolkata) Lalan Kumar Ram (Ongoing)
